description: Try our easy to follow Tiramisu With White Chocolate recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tiramisu With White Chocolate Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.4 cup black coffee, freshly made, cooled

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the coffee and Frangelico. Cut the sponge cake into cubes and divide half the cubes between 4 glasses. Add a tablespoon of the coffee mixture to each glass.
Whip the cream with the sugar and half the remaining coffee mixture in a bowl until soft peaks form.
Whisk the egg whites in a separate bowl until stiff, then carefully fold into the cream mixture.
Spoon half the cream mixture into the glasses and top with the remaining sponge cubes, coffee mixture and cream mixture. Sprinkle with the chocolate. Chill in the refrigerator for 1 hour.
